timeline.author: zjuwangg

timeline.bodyText:
Will there be  a performance problem to collect all elements in advance?
For example, the parallelism of source is one and the totalNoOfElements is a big number
timeline.author: zjuwangg

replies.bodyText: Yes, this is the same mechanism to StatefulSequenceSource, it is hard to modify, we can leave this improvement to future.
replies.author: JingsongLi
